Pre-Game Insights: Brazil is seeking to continue their fantastic record of reaching every single World Cup finals.
Brazil fell behind early on in their last match against Chile but managed to come back and win thanks to a goal from Igor Jesus and Luiz Henrique.
Peru moved off the bottom of the section with their first win last week against Uruguay.
Dorival Junior, Brazil's manager, made a masterstroke by trusting in Botafogo's in-form players in the last match.
